SEARCH
Package com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.dao

Interface DatabaseDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MySQLDatabaseDAO
public interface DatabaseDAO
The DatabaseDAO interface defines the contract for interacting with the database in the application. It provides methods for performing various database operations related to films, users, reviews, and favorites.

  • Method Details

    • authorization

      User authorization(String login, String password) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Authenticates a user with the provided login and password.
      Parameters:
      login - the user login
      password - the user password
      Returns:
      the authenticated user
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs during the authorization process

    • registration

      User registration(String login, String password) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Registers a new user with the provided login and password.
      Parameters:
      login - the user login
      password - the user password
      Returns:
      the registered user
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs during the registration process

    • addFilm

      void addFilm(String title, String description, String genre, String duration, String director, Integer releaseYear, String language, String country, Double price, String imageURL) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Adds a new film to the database with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      title - the film title
      description - the film description
      genre - the film genre
      duration - the film duration
      director - the film director
      releaseYear - the film release year
      language - the film language
      country - the film country
      price - the film price
      imageURL - the URL of the film image
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while adding the film

    • updateFilmById

      void updateFilmById(Integer idFilm, String title, String description, String genre, String duration, String director, Integer releaseYear, String language, String country, Double price, String imageURL) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Updates a film in the database with the specified ID and details.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to update
      title - the updated film title
      description - the updated film description
      genre - the updated film genre
      duration - the updated film duration
      director - the updated film director
      releaseYear - the updated film release year
      language - the updated film language
      country - the updated film country
      price - the updated film price
      imageURL - the updated URL of the film image
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while updating the film

      void deleteFilmById(Integer idFilm) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Deletes a film from the database with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to delete
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while deleting the film

      Parameters:
      pageNumberInUserList - the page number in the user list
      Returns:
      a list of users
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while retrieving the user list

      a list of films in the cart for the user

      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while retrieving the films in the cart

    • addFilmToCart

      void addFilmToCart(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Adds a film to the cart of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to add to the cart
      idUser - the ID of the user to add the film to their cart
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while adding the film to the cart

    • deleteFilmFromCart

      void deleteFilmFromCart(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Removes a film from the cart of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to remove from the cart
      idUser - the ID of the user to remove the film from their cart
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while removing the film from the cart

    • purchaseFilmsFromCart

      void purchaseFilmsFromCart(Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Purchases the films from the cart of a user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the ID of the user
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while purchasing the films from the cart

      a list of favorite films for the specified user
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while retrieving the favorite films list

    • addFilmToFavorites

      void addFilmToFavorites(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Adds a film to the favorites list of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to add to the favorites list
      idUser - the ID of the user to add the film to their favorites list
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while adding the film to the favorites list

    • deleteFilmFromFavorites

      void deleteFilmFromFavorites(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Removes a film from the favorites list of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to remove from the favorites list
      idUser - the ID of the user to remove the film from their favorites list
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while removing the film from the favorites list

    • isFilmInFavorites

      Integer isFilmInFavorites(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Checks if a film is in the favorites list of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to check
      idUser - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      1 if the film is in the favorites list, 0 otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while checking if the film is in the favorites list

    • getReviewsByFilmId

      ArrayList<Review> getReviewsByFilmId(Integer idFilm) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Retrieves the reviews for a film with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to retrieve reviews for
      Returns:
      a list of reviews for the specified film
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while retrieving the reviews

    • addReview

      void addReview(Integer idFilm, String username, Integer rating, String description) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Adds a review for a film.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film
      username - the username of the user who wrote the review
      rating - the rating of the film in the review
      description - the description of the review
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while adding the review

    • deleteReviewById

      void deleteReviewById(Integer idReview) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Deletes a review with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idReview - the ID of the review to delete
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while deleting the review

    • updateReviewById

      void updateReviewById(Integer idReview, Integer rating, String description) throws DatabaseDAOException
      Updates a review with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idReview - the ID of the review to update
      rating - the updated rating for the review
      description - the updated description for the review
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while updating the review
